隔たり: (へだたり) - distance; interval; gap; difference; estrangement
隔てる: (へだてる) - to separate (by distance, time, etc.)/to isolate/to partition/to divide; to interpose/to have between; to alienate/to estrange

隔世の感が有る: (かくせいのかんがある) - to be poles apart

隔年: (かくねん) - biannually; every second year; every other year
隔月: (かくげつ) - every second month; every other month
隔絶: (かくぜつ) - isolation; separation; remoteness; seclusion; reclusion; inaccessibility; sequestration

隗より始めよ: (かいよりはじめよ) - start with the first step/when embarking on a great project, start with immediate steps; he who first suggests it should be the first to do it
隙: (intenso/gostar) - fissure , gap, space; break, interlude, interval; chink (in one's armor, armour), chance, opportunity, weak spot; breach (of a relationship between people)
隙あり: (スキあり) - chink in the armor (armour)
隙かさず: (すかさず) - without a moment's delay

隙も与えず: (すきもあたえず) - (usu. after plain verb) before one could; in no time at all; without a gap
隙を窺う: (すきをうかがう) - to watch for an unguarded moment
隙を見付ける: (すきをみつける) - to seize an opportunity
隙アリ: (スキあり) - chink in the armor (armour)
隙人: (ひまじん) - person with a lot of free time on their hands; person of leisure; idler
隙間: (sukima) - crevice, crack, gap, opening, clearance; spare moment, interval, break, pause, spare time , crevice, crack, gap, opening, clearance; spare moment, interval, break, pause, spare time; chink (em sua armadura), unpreparedness, carelessness
隙間の神: (すきまのかみ) - God of the gaps
隙間風: (すきまかぜ) - draft/draught/cold air entering through the crack of a door or window; cooling off of a relationship/draft of cold air between two persons
際: (sai/kiwa) - occasion , edge, brink, verge, side; time, moment of
際する: (さいする) - to arrive; to come to pass
際だつ: (きわだつ) - to be prominent; to be conspicuous
際どい: (きわどい) - very close/close/narrow (e.g. narrow victory)/dangerous/risky/hazardous; suggestive/bordering on the obscene/risqué/delicate (e.g. question)/immoral/questionable/shady; extreme/harsh/cruel
際に: (さいに) - in case of; at that time; at this time
際疾い: (きわどい) - very close/close/narrow (e.g. narrow victory)/dangerous/risky/hazardous; suggestive/bordering on the obscene/risqué/delicate (e.g. question)/immoral/questionable/shady; extreme/harsh/cruel
際立つ: (きわだつ) - to be prominent; to be conspicuous
際限なく: (さいげんなく) - ad infinitum; endlessly
際限なく続く: (さいげんなくつづく) - to continue without end; to go on to eternity
